content: keep yourself warm and cozy with this oversized crochet chevron blanket this easy crochet blanket pattern features stripes and uses bulky-weight yarn it s the perfect relaxing crochet project after a long day of work plus who doesn t love snuggling up with a blanket that continues to grow in size as you make it details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - size of blanket is 56 x 66 inches - includes a stripe chart materials needed - 3 balls of lion brand re-spun thick & quick yarn in the color sepia rose weight 6 / 12 oz 223 yards a total of 669 yards or another super bulky weight category 6 yarn - 4 balls of lion brand re-spun thick & quick yarn in the color whipped cream weight 6 / 12 oz 223 yards a total of 892 yards or another super bulky weight category 6 yarn - 2 balls of lion brand re-spun thick & quick yarn in the color spruce weight 6 / 12 oz 223 yards a total of 446 yards or another super bulky weight category 6 yarn - 10 0 mm crochet hook size n - darning needle - scissors - stitch markers
